resources.string: This is the welcome screen of the Better With Music app. \nThe user is presented with a small description of the app and invited to choose between the categories of music available by tapping the "Pick and activity!" button

Yes! Scientific studies have shown that performance in any field can be improved when you listen to music.
 
But not just any music. 
 
This app provides you with just the music you need. Just pick an activity and enjoy the benefits of MUSIC!

This screen shows the songs available to aid the study activity. The user should be able to scroll through them or search for a specific song and pick one to play. He should also be able to download / buy new songs from the BWM library. The payment should be processed via PayPal. The user will be taken to the BWM music store and, after selecting the desired songs,to the PayPal screen in order to input his PayPal credentials. The user should be able to choose between a Single Payment or Future Payments. When choosing Future Payments the user will input his credentials only once and agree to all future payments while using the BWM music store.

The END SESSION button should take the user to the activity categories screen in order to pick another type of activity

This screen shows the type of activities the user can choose to improve with music. The user should be able to add his own custom category and choose his own songs either from existing songs already on the device or to buy online from a bwm specific website.
